audit_tests.name: Ensure that the etcd data directory permissions are set to 700 or more restrictive (Automated)
audit_tests.description: Ensure that the etcd data directory has permissions of 700 or more restrictive.
audit_tests.audit: stat -c %a "$(ps -ef | grep etcd |grep 'data-dir' > psetcd && grep -o 'data-dir=[^"]\S*' psetcd | awk -F "=" '{print $2}' && rm psetcd)"
audit_tests.remediation: chmod 700 "$(ps -ef | grep etcd |grep 'data-dir' > psetcd && grep -o 'data-dir=[^"]\S*' psetcd | awk -F "=" '{print $2}' && rm psetcd)"
audit_tests.default_value: By default, etcd data directory has permissions of 755.

audit_tests.name: Ensure that the etcd data directory ownership is set to etcd:etcd (Automated)
audit_tests.description: Ensure that the etcd data directory ownership is set to etcd:etcd.
audit_tests.audit: stat -c %U:%G "$(ps -ef | grep etcd |grep 'data-dir' > psetcd && grep -o 'data-dir=[^"]\S*' psetcd | awk -F "=" '{print $2}' && rm psetcd)"
audit_tests.remediation: chown etcd:etcd "$(ps -ef | grep etcd |grep 'data-dir' > psetcd && grep -o 'data-dir=[^"]\S*' psetcd | awk -F "=" '{print $2}' && rm psetcd)"
audit_tests.default_value: By default, etcd data directory ownership is set to etcd:etcd.
